projects.name: Fake News Detection Model
projects.description: A machine learning model built with Python and Scikit-learn to classify news articles as either real or fake based on their content. Utilizes TF-IDF vectorization and a Passive-Aggressive Classifier.

projects.name: E-commerce Web Application
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with Flask and PostgreSQL. Features user authentication, product catalogs, a shopping cart, and Stripe integration for payments.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis of Tweets
projects.description: A Natural Language Processing (NLP) project that analyzes the sentiment of real-time tweets about a specific topic. Uses the Twitter API, NLTK for text processing, and a pre-trained model for classification.

projects.name: Interactive Data Dashboard
projects.description: A data visualization dashboard built with Plotly Dash to display and interact with sales data. Allows users to filter by date, region, and product category to gain insights.

projects.name: Deep Learning Image Classifier
projects.description: A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) built with TensorFlow/Keras to classify images into 10 different categories (e.g., CIFAR-10 dataset). Includes data augmentation and model evaluation.
